message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $22000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand your interest in the product, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you in the middle just yet. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $20000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I'm still very interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $17500 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that $17500 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, at $19500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $18000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make another counteroffer, but I'm not going to go any lower than $19000. This is the best price I can offer considering the product's value and quality. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make another offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $18500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm not willing to go any higher than $19000, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but I need to know you're serious about the product. I'll meet you halfway between our previous offers, at $18750. This is my final offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $18500, but I need to know if you're willing to meet me at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
